contentrichtext.text: [[Image:OUSLogo small.png|right]] '''The Oregon University System''' ('''OUS''') consists of seven [[public university|public]], four-year [[universities]] and one branch campus in the State of [[Oregon]] administered by the Oregon State Board of Higher Education (the "Board") and the Chancellor of the OUS, who is appointed by the [[Board]]. The current Chancellor is [[George Pernsteiner]], formerly Vice Chancellor of Administrative Services at the [[University of California, Santa Barbara]], Vice President of Finance and Administration at [[Portland State University]] and Associate Vice Chancellor at OUS. Pernsteiner has been in this position since July 2004. == Constituent universities == {|class="wikitable sortable" !Name!!Location!!Established!!Enrollment Fall 2011 |- |[[Eastern Oregon University]]||[[La Grande, Oregon|La Grande]]||1929||<span style="display:none">4298</span>4,298 |- |[[Oregon Institute of Technology]]||[[Klamath Falls, Oregon|Klamath Falls]]||1947||<span style="display:none">3911</span>3,911 |- |[[Oregon State University]]||[[Corvallis, Oregon|Corvallis]]||1868||<span style="display:none">24977</span>24,977 |- |[[Portland State University]]||[[Portland, Oregon|Portland]]||1946||<span style="display:none">28958</span>28,958 |- |[[Southern Oregon University]]||[[Ashland, Oregon|Ashland]]||1926||<span style="display:none">6744</span>6,744 |- |[[University of Oregon]]||[[Eugene, Oregon|Eugene]]||1876||<span style="display:none">24447</span>24,447 |- |[[Western Oregon University]]||[[Monmouth, Oregon|Monmouth]]||1856||<span style="display:none">6217</span>6,217 |} OUS also has one affiliate institution: [[Oregon Health & Science University]] == References == <references /> == External links == * [http://www.ous.edu/ Oregon University System Home Page] {{Oregon University System}} [[Category:Oregon University System| ]] [[Category:Education in Oregon]] [[Category:Public university systems in the United States|O]] [[Category:Association of Public and Land-Grant Universities]] {{Oregon-gov-stub}}
